name: df-dfat
body: |- wb(wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
comment: Definition of the predicate that determines if some class ` F ` is defined as function for an argument ` A ` or, in other words, if the function value for some class ` F ` for an argument ` A ` is defined. We say that ` F ` is defined at ` A ` if a ` F ` is a function restricted to the member ` A ` of its domain. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)
